feed.title: Heavy Hitters
feed.subtitle: Heavy Hitters, hosted by Dean Gutic and Charlie Norman, is your one-stop shop for all things contact sports. Every week, Dean and Charlie will be discussing the likes of NFL and college football, baseball, hockey, and UFC fighting. Be sure to tune in weekly for all the heavy hits and harder takes!

author.name: High Tops Media & Dean Gutic, Charlie Norman

entry.title: MLB Takeaways, NHL Playoffs Talk, Israel Adesanya Takes Back the Middleweight Belt and Dan Snyder Sells the Team - Season 2 Episode 7

link.title: MLB Takeaways, NHL Playoffs Talk, Israel Adesanya Takes Back the Middleweight Belt and Dan Snyder Sells the Team - Season 2 Episode 7

entry.content:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean and Charlie give us their takeaways so far in the MLB season based on what’s been going on around the league, along with a recap of the 2022-23 NHL season and a preview of the playoffs. After that, both go over the knockout win from last week for Israel Adesanya as he regained the Middleweight belt by knockout against Pereira, and finally they give us their reaction to Dan Snyder selling the Washington Commanders to a new owner for $6 Billion.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: MLB Opening Weekend, NFL Free Agency Reactions, NHL Wild Card Race - Season 2 Episode 6

link.title: MLB Opening Weekend, NFL Free Agency Reactions, NHL Wild Card Race - Season 2 Episode 6

entry.content:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean and Charlie welcome us into the 2023 MLB season as they give us their thoughts so far on the new rules in baseball with opening weekend, along with what they have seen from their teams and other teams across the MLB. Then they give us their reactions in NFL free agency to the moves that have occurred so far this offseason. They end off with some wild card predictions in the NHL along with the update on the standings and the playoff race.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

link.title: MLB AL Preview & WBC Review - Season 2 Episode 5

entry.content:

entry.title: MLB Part 3 Division Preview, NFL QB Carousel, and Jon Jones - Season 2 Episode 4

link.title: MLB Part 3 Division Preview, NFL QB Carousel, and Jon Jones - Season 2 Episode 4

entry.content:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean and Charlie preview part three of their preview series of each MLB division with the NL West along with their NL wild card picks. Afterwards, they give us their reaction to the QB market and the latest news in the NFL before free agency and a review of Jon Jones’ big victory at UFC 285, becoming the new UFC heavyweight champion.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: MLB Part 2 Division Preview, MLB Spring Training, Gavin Lux, Manny Machado and Patrick Kane to the Rangers - Season 2 Episode 3

link.title: MLB Part 2 Division Preview, MLB Spring Training, Gavin Lux, Manny Machado and Patrick Kane to the Rangers - Season 2 Episode 3

entry.content:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean and Charlie preview part two of their preview series of each MLB division with the NL Central along with updates on MLB spring training, a reaction to Manny Machado resigning in San Diego and Gavin Lux having a torn ACL. Afterwards, they give us their reaction to Patrick Kane being dealt from the Chicago Blackhawks to the NY Rangers in a big trade to help bolster the Rangers chances at a Stanley Cup.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: MLB Part 1 Division Preview, MLB Rule Changes, College Football Proposed Rule Changes, NFL Coaching Hires - Season 2 Episode 2

link.title: MLB Part 1 Division Preview, MLB Rule Changes, College Football Proposed Rule Changes, NFL Coaching Hires - Season 2 Episode 2

entry.content:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean Gutic, and new co-host Charlie Norman, preview in part one of their preview series of each MLB division, starting off with the NL East along with the rule changes that have occurred in the MLB. After that, they gave us their reaction to the proposed rule changes in college football and the coaching hires that have taken place this past week in the NFL.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!

entry.title: Super Bowl 57 Recap/Reaction - Season 2 Episode 1
entry.content:
Heavy Hitters is back for their second season! This week, Dean Gutic, along with his new co-host Charlie Norman, gives us a recap of Super Bowl 57 as the Kansas City Chiefs defeated the Philadelphia Eagles 38-35, along with their reaction to the big game and the halftime show.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram

entry.title: EXCLUSIVE: 2022 Cortaca Jug Recap and Playoff Game Preview vs UMass Dartmouth - Season 1 Episode 10

link.title: EXCLUSIVE: 2022 Cortaca Jug Recap and Playoff Game Preview vs UMass Dartmouth - Season 1 Episode 10

entry.content:
This week, on a special edition of the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean Gutic is joined by the co-host of the One on One podcast, Jack Acello. Jack and Dean give us a recap of the 63rd annual Cortaca Jug, along with their experience at Yankee stadium. After that, both Jack and Dean give us a preview and their predictions for Ithaca’s upcoming playoff game against UMass Dartmouth.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
https://www.instagram.com/heavyhittershtm/

A High Tops Media Podcast You can follow for more High Tops Media content on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @hightopsmedia
And to find more podcasts with High Tops Sports, check out @hightopssports on Instagram
Check out more podcasts on our website https://hightops.media

entry.title: College Football Playoff Rankings Reaction, Week 12 Predictions, UFC 281 Recap, and Heaviest Hit Of the Week - Season 1 Episode 9

link.title: College Football Playoff Rankings Reaction, Week 12 Predictions, UFC 281 Recap, and Heaviest Hit Of the Week - Season 1 Episode 9

entry.content:
This week on the Heavy Hitters podcast, Dean gives us an update on the college football playoffs rankings of 2022, along with his week 12 predictions for the upcoming games this weekend. Dean also gives us a recap of UFC 281 and then ends off the episode giving us his heaviest hit of the week from the past week.

Don’t forget to follow on Instagram!
